net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.execution.target

Class ShasumSummaryFileTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.execution.target.ShasumSummaryFileTarget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutionTarget

    public class ShasumSummaryFileTarget
extends Object
implements ExecutionTarget
    An ExecutionTarget that writes digests to a shasum file compatible with "shasum -b -a <algo> <files> > sha.sum". For compatibility with shasum only SHA-1, SHA-224, SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512, SHA-512224 and SHA-512256 are supported. Only one algorithm may be used at a time.
    Since:
    1.3
    Author:
    Julien Nicoulaud, Mike Duigou

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected SortedSet<String> algorithms
      The set of algorithms encountered.
      protected Iterable<? extends ArtifactListener> artifactListeners
      List of listeners which are notified every time a sum file is created.
      protected Map<ChecksumFile,Map<String,String>> filesHashcodes
      The association file => (algorithm,hashcode).
      static String LINE_SEPARATOR
      The line separator character.
      static String SHASUM_BINARY_FILE
      The shasum binary character.
      static String SHASUM_FIELD_SEPARATOR
      The shasum field separator (and file type binary identifier)
      protected File summaryFile
      The target file where the summary is written.
